source:
CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS gold;

-- Create views on Silver tables
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW silver_d_products AS
SELECT * FROM delta.`abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products`;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW silver_d_regions AS
SELECT * FROM delta.`abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers`;

-- Create tables in the Gold layer
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gold.d_products
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_products'
AS
SELECT 
  product_id AS IdProduct,
  product_name AS Name,
  brand_name AS Brand,
  sub_brand_name AS SubBrand,
  category_name AS Category 
FROM silver_d_products
WHERE 1 = 0;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gold.d_regions
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_regions'
AS
SELECT 
  country_id AS IDCountry,
  cluster AS Claster,
  region_description AS Region,
  country AS Country
FROM silver_d_regions
WHERE 1 = 0;

-- Rename columns in the d_products table and write to Gold layer
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE gold.d_products
SELECT 
  product_id AS IdProduct,
  product_name AS Name,
  brand_name AS Brand,
  sub_brand_name AS SubBrand,
  category_name AS Category
FROM silver_d_products;

-- Remove duplicates in the d_regions table and write to the Gold table
INSERT OVERWRITE TABLE gold.d_regions
SELECT DISTINCT 
  country_id AS IDCountry,
  cluster AS Claster,
  region_description AS Region,
  country AS Country
FROM silver_d_regions;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gold.d_dates
    USING DELTA
    LOCATION 'abfss://gold@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_dates/'
